update EnterpriseJobVacancy
EJobVacancyID = #{record.ejobvacancyid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EnterpriseID = #{record.enterpriseid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SalaryTypeID = #{record.salarytypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ProvinceCode = #{record.provincecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CityCode = #{record.citycode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

WorkAddress = #{record.workaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HirePeopleNo = #{record.hirepeopleno,jdbcType=INTEGER},
IsFinalHire = #{record.isfinalhire,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RecruitExpireDate = #{record.recruitexpiredate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

JobChineseRequirement = #{record.jobchineserequirement,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JobChineseResponsibility = #{record.jobchineseresponsibility,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JobEnglishRequirement = #{record.jobenglishrequirement,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
JobEnglishResponsibility = #{record.jobenglishresponsibility,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Salary = #{record.salary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SalaryPriceBeforeTax = #{record.salarypricebeforetax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SalaryPriceAfterTax = #{record.salarypriceaftertax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CreateBy = #{record.createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CreateTime = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CreatePersonID = #{record.createpersonid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
UpdateBy = #{record.updateby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UpdateTmie = #{record.updatetmie,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UpdatePersonID = #{record.updatepersonid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
Remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IsOpen = #{record.isopen,jdbcType=CHAR},
LeftPeopleNo = #{record.leftpeopleno,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NextReruitDate = #{record.nextreruitdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IsAuditPassed = #{record.isauditpassed,jdbcType=CHAR},
Auditor = #{record.auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AuditorID = #{record.auditorid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

IsZhongBoXingChen = #{record.iszhongboxingchen,jdbcType=CHAR},

DeploymentTime = #{record.deploymenttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM EnterpriseJobVacancy
IsDelete='N' AND IsZhongBoXingChen = 'Y'
AND (IsOpen=#{IsOpen})
AND (IsAuditPassed=#{IsAuditPassed})
AND (JobTypeID=#{jobtypeid})
AND (JobTitle like #{jobtitle})
ORDER BY EJobVacancyID DESC LIMIT #{startSize},#{pageSize}

SELECT count(EJobVacancyID) FROM EnterpriseJobVacancy
IsDelete='N' AND IsZhongBoXingChen = 'Y'
AND (IsOpen=#{IsOpen})
AND (IsAuditPassed=#{IsAuditPassed})
AND (JobTypeID=#{jobtypeid})
AND (JobTitle like #{jobtitle})

SELECT
FROM EnterpriseJobVacancy
IsDelete='Y' AND IsZhongBoXingChen = 'Y'
AND (JobTypeID=#{jobtypeid})
AND (JobTitle like #{jobtitle})
ORDER BY EJobVacancyID DESC LIMIT #{startSize},#{pageSize}

SELECT count(EJobVacancyID) FROM EnterpriseJobVacancy
IsDelete='Y' AND IsZhongBoXingChen = 'Y'
AND (JobTypeID=#{jobtypeid})
AND (JobTitle like #{jobtitle})

SELECT a.* FROM EnterpriseJobVacancy a, EnterpriseInfo b WHERE a.EnterpriseID = b.EnterpriseID AND IsZhongBoXingChen = "N" AND a.IsDelete = 'N' AND a.IsOpen = "Y" AND a.IsAuditPassed = 'Y'
AND (a.JobTitle LIKE #{search} OR b.EnterpriseName LIKE #{search})
ORDER BY a.UpdateTmie DESC
SELECT JobTitle FROM EnterpriseJobVacancy WHERE EJobVacancyID = #{jobID}
SELECT * FROM EnterpriseJobVacancy WHERE IsOpen = "Y" AND RecruitExpireDate < #{nowDate}
